pkgmetadata.longdescription:
This package contains: - vcsFPService daemon - driver for the sensor (libvfsFprintWrapper.so) - validity-sensor binary
This driver supports these devices: - VFS301 (ID 138A:0005) - VFS451 (ID 138A:0007) - VFS471 (ID 138A:003c) - VFS491 (ID 138A:003d) - VFS495 (ID 138A:003f) - VFS5011 (ID 138A:0011) - VFS5111 (ID 138A:0010) - VFS5131 (ID 138A:0018)
